% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	\bullet && A && B \\
	\\
	&&&& C
	\arrow["f", two heads, from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["u", shift left, from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["v"', shift right, from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["g"', from=1-3, to=3-5]
	\arrow["i"', tail, from=3-5, to=1-5]
	\arrow["j", curve={height=-12pt}, dashed, from=1-5, to=3-5]
\end{tikzcd}
